File.Name: IDebugClientPtr
IDebugControlPtr
DEBUG_VALUE
File.Content: boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((char) value().I8)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((short) value().I16)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((int) value().I32)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((long long) value().I64)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((unsigned char) value().I8)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((unsigned short) value().I16)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((unsigned int) value().I32)); return res;
boost::shared_ptr< Base<EncodingT> > res(new Numeric<EncodingT>((unsigned long long) value().I64)); return res;
